casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Troy JACKSON Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 10, 2018

Adele V. Patterson, senior assistant public defender, in support of the petition.

Ronald G. Weller, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 178 Conn. App. 16, 173 A.3d 974 (2017), is denied.
